review: Worked well... Easy to install and use.  Wish prime had more content.
author: Daniel

review: The interface is similar to Apple TV; it works well in proximity of the wireless router, but experiences problems when it is 25 feet away, while other wireless devices (iPad, Mac) do not.  Something needs to be resolved there.
author: vartan messier

review: It is amazing.  I am in my 80's and have had no problems negotiating the menu.  I especially like being able to view a series from the very begining.
author: Dorothy Meerschaert

review: Works great, and lives up to what I was expecting.
author: Larry Hayes

review: I returned it because my tv was a smart TV and did not need it. Seemed like great product though.
author: Rick

review: Only works part of the time.
author: Amazon Customer

review: this is not a review... i am interested in the fire stick but am uncertain of how it works. Do i need to have a previous WIFI provider for this to work? or does it act as its own signal?
author: eric martin

review: Exceeded our expectations. Stream without any interruptions.
author: Angela Schenk

review: works like a charm and very easy to use.
author: Shara Bergeron-Scherer
